Description: Schecter Diamond Series Hellraiser Hybrid SGR C1FRS Ultra Violet Electric Guitar Item Description:You are bidding on a previously owned and in good playing condition Schecter Diamond Series Hellraiser Hybrid C1FRS Ultra Violet Electric Guitar. This auction is for the guitar and roadrunner case you see pictured. I am including two trem bars, one of them does not fit in the guitar and might be for a different one ( I do not know if either are original). Nothing else is included. It comes as pictured. Please take a moment to look at the pictures and get a better idea of what you are bidding on. One of the strings is cut and will need to be replaced. There are scuffs and scratches on the body from normal play wear. The neck is straight and the headstock is in good shape. The frets are in good shape as well with plenty of life in them. The back of the neck is smooth. The electronics have been tested and are in good working condition. This guitar is in good playing condition. The case has some dust, scuffs, and fraying from use. You might want to swap it out. We are including it for shipping safety. Please take a moment to check out my other great guitars!
